xml2rdf.util.transformer

Class XSLTtransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • xml2rdf.util.transformer.XSLTtransformer

  • public class XSLTtransformer
extends java.lang.Object
    Usage: XSLTtransformer trans = new XSLTtransformer();
    // Load XML file
    trans.LoadSourceFileFromURI("source.xml");
    // Load XSLT file.
    trans.LoadXSLTFileFromURI("transform.xsl");
    // prepare output file.
    trans.SetOutputFileURI("output.rdf");
    // take transformation procedure.
    if(trans.DoTransformation()) {
    System.out.println("The transformation is successful.");
    }
    Author:
    Jyun-Yao Huang (Allen; allen501pc@gmail.com)
